channel.title: Chapter 1 - Security Clearance Level 3
channel.description:
Chapter 1, after going down the first elevator you eventually reach a door with a security officer and a sign reading "Security Clearance Level 3". The door opens automatically for you, but if you sprint through and then immediately back out, the door will close on you and you will be stuck.
[img]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=1507&stc=1&d=1347710208[/img] [img]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=1508&stc=1&d=1347710208[/img] [img]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=1509&stc=1&d=1347710208[/img]
[code]] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c1a0b at: -2285 x, 2632 y, -191 z players : 1 (1 max)
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 3 "sirp0p0" UNKNOWN 08:07 29 0 active loopback
] getpos setpos -2285.867188 2632.667725 -191.968750;setang 6.200580 -172.181976 0.000000 [/code] ![shot_1.jpg|690x500](upload://e91J8PwvOchKmKBtMh5M6Gmz68m.jpeg) ![shot_2.jpg|690x500](upload://iMZlyFeRreV3n22aRo0MNRTUmGE.jpeg) ![shot_3.jpg|690x500](upload://cJMXF294F7hH0TssZMboNXtPyn6.jpeg)

item.title: Chapter 1 - Security Clearance Level 3

Chapter 1, after going down the first elevator you eventually reach a door with a security officer and a sign reading “Security Clearance Level 3”. The door opens automatically for you, but if you sprint through and then immediately back out, the door will close on you and you will be stuck.
